ngiemboon: Gíŋe ḿbíte nò gie ɔ̀ fóo légɔɔn.
Tá we tumó yé, á zɔɔn tè píʼ.
en: His father commissioned him, he didn't even move.

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn ńgɔɔn nò, ɔ̀ pɔ́ɔn lépíʼ.
Ḿbíʼi kɔ́ à gɔ̌ɔn ngie à tè tó gwɔ́?
en: Why does he say he's not coming?
He played the ball with a candle.

ngiemboon: Múɔ lɔɔn ńtɔ́gɔ sekúd, á gwɔ́ mbòŋ.
en: It will be good if the child succeeds in school.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ ngyǎ tsɔ̌ nyìŋ mbǒŋ lóŋ á kẅéte wɔ́ɔn na pɔ̀ɔn yɔ́ɔn.
en: I saw a merciful man who helped me carry my bag.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gʉ̌a nkáʼ ńdag nkẅíŋ, n tè gyá mbòŋo mmó.
en: I went to the field to collect wood and I didn't see much.
